description: This file defines a service class 'BaseApiService' in an Angular application that standardizes HTTP API calls using the Angular HttpClient. It provides methods for GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, and DELETE requests, with support for API base URL resolution and mock mode detection.

classes.name: BaseApiService
classes.description: A service that encapsulates HTTP methods with automatic base URL handling and mock mode logic.

methods.name: apiBase
methods.description: Returns the resolved API base URL.

methods.name: mock
methods.description: Indicates whether the application is running in mock mode.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Performs an HTTP GET request with the API base URL prefix.

methods.name: post
methods.description: Performs an HTTP POST request with the API base URL prefix.

methods.name: put
methods.description: Performs an HTTP PUT request with the API base URL prefix.

methods.name: patch
methods.description: Performs an HTTP PATCH request with the API base URL prefix.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Performs an HTTP DELETE request with the API base URL prefix.

methods.name: join
methods.description: Helper function to concatenate base URL and path correctly.

methods.name: toParams
methods.description: Converts a record of key-value pairs into Angular HttpParams.
